IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: COLLEGE PREPARATORY SECONDARY SCHOOL FOR BOYS
IRS990.MissionDescription: MEMPHIS UNIVERSITY SCHOOL IS A COLLEGE-PREPARATORY SCHOOL DEDICATED TO ACADEMIC EXCELLENCE AND THE DEVELOPMENT OF WELL-ROUNDED YOUNG MEN OF STRONG MORAL CHARACTER, CONSISTENT WITH THE SCHOOL'S CHRISTIAN TRADITION.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The Headmaster, Controller and Director of BUsiness Operations review the 990 prior to filing.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Monies paid to suppliers are consistently checked for employee/board interests.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15a
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The executive committee of the Board of trustees reviews and determines the Headmaster's compensation using statistics and benchmarks from NAIS schools around the nation. Compensation for salaried employees is determined by the Headmaster, and compensation for hourly employees is determined by the director of business operations.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The organization makes its governing documents, conflicts of interest policy, and financial statements available to the public upon request.
